name: EL BARRIO
ingredients: (Lemon, pepper, fennel, salt, sugar, garlic, orange, chilies, fenugreek, onion, turmeric, mace, thyme, coriander, cumin, ginger, cayenne, arrowroot, cinnamon, anise, cloves, cardamom, paprika.)
description: This warm citrus-based seasoning has peppery, salted, tart, tangy, and licoricey flavors with floral notes. This is an all-purpose blend, fantastic for most savory dishes. Substitute for black pepper anywhere you want a bold, zesty flavor.
